contractor_grading_criteria.description: Criteria used to compute the Contractor Grade (A+ to F). Based on public records, platform activity, and homeowner feedback.
data_points_required: State/City License Verification (Includes proof of Bond/Insurance)
Completion on Time (Adherence to contract timelines)
Average response time on platform (for communication score)
Clarity of scope language in uploaded bids (AI assessed)
Historical data on payment disputes (low score on financial risk)

homeowner_grading_criteria.description: Criteria used to compute the Homeowner Grade (A+ to F). Only visible to Contractors.
data_points_required: Response time to messages on platform
Number of requested changes after contract signing
